channel.title: We now have Bitcoin donations!
channel.description:
If you like what we're doing with this site and want to help support our running costs our Bitcoin address is: 1Hp1p87sryWfNd5jsVCMq5bK8zztUTsndx
Currently we don't want to have ads, because ads suck. Thanks! pry0cc
